dialog.text: Your rreputation preceedes you. My people say you have a chance at winning the election.

choice.text: I guess I'm worth your time now?
You have quite the reputation yourself.

dialog.text: Sorry, but you're not worth my time, little mouse.
I value my time and so should you. I also value information, so tell me...
What do they say about me?

choice.text: You take care of you're friends.

dialog.text: Creatures of prriviledge don't know what it's like to make your on the streets. Sometimes you need to get your paws dirrty.

choice.text: You can't create change that way.

dialog.text: As long as my people arre taken care of, that's all that matters. That's what a good leader is.
Hm, I'm informed there's a prrroblem I need to attend to. Let's continue this discussion another time.
Your campaign might prove to be a good investment opportunity for me.
Take this gold. And my Photography team too.
Great. Excellent!
Haha. Your loss
Have you met Owlberto? I hate him
He owes me a lot of money but is acting like he don't
IKR!
Sucks to be you too.
A marvelous morning to you my good mouse.
I have nothing to say to you.
Ah, what impressive wordplay!
I see you value a good education. I do as well, and I have an idea that will elevate education on Summer Island!
Looks like you could use an upgrade to your education platform, and I have just the thing.
I have actualized a single book that contains all the knowledge our children need to learn at school.
Indeed! Now if only I could convince the local school to purchase it and replace the moldifying manuals.
It would be greatly satisfying to me if you would promote the book during your campaign.

choice.text: Sure, I'd be delighted to do it!
And what do I get in return?
My campaign is not a marketing tool.

dialog.text: Splendid! My publisher will be very... I mean, the children of this island will be indebted to you.
I wasn't informed that we were conducting a business transaction.
I'm insulted that you would imagine I am capable of thinking such a thing!
Oh my, looks like I'm late for a lecture again. I must be off!
I hate Catorcio. He is buying his way to high society.
He is nothing but a criminal.
We need to do something about this.
A leopard never changes his spots. He surely has a little leopard in him.
A marvelous morning to you my good mouse!
I have nothing to say to you.
Someone who appreciates alliteration, how wonderful!
What largess can I bestow upon you today?

choice.text: I'd like your support in the elections.

dialog.text: Oh, they're really not THAT big. Here, look them up in the dictionary.
Before we go any further, tell me, what do you think of Catorcio?

choice.text: He's a criminal, plain and simple.
He's trying to mend his ways.
Sorry, I don't really know him.

dialog.text: That's indubitably what I was telling Father Doglas, but he wouldn't listen.
Hmm, I see...
Oh, dear, would you look at the time! I have a class to attend! We will have to leave this discussion for some other time
Hi, I'm Pelicarpio.
Cool. Bye.
Yep, these shells have seen better days.
Soo. You're that guy. Well, good luck.
A blessed day to you my child.

choice.text: And to you as well, Pader.
Actually I've had a rough day.

dialog.text: I cannot speak with you unless you confess your sins.
You have confessed your sins. Do your penance and pray to the Almighty Bone for guidance.
Then there is nothing more for us to discuss. I shall pray for your soul.
Blessings come to those who are faithful to the Thigh Bone. That's why it worries me that Pelicarpio allows worship of the Shin Bone in his district.

choice.text: But isn't the Shin bone connected to the Thigh Bone?

dialog.text: You must always count your blessings my child.

choice.text: I hate it when people say that.

dialog.text: I'm so glad you agree, my child!
Blessings come to those who are faithful to the Thigh Bone. That's why it worries me that Pelicarpio allows worship of the Shin Bone in his district.
Oh dear, it's almost time for the service and I still need to write my sermon. Let us speak again my child. Be One with the Thigh Bone.
Bathala bless you my friend.

choice.text: Bat... hala? Is that like Valhalla?

dialog.text: I'm sorry, but I'm totally getting bad vibes from you.
Bathala is the supreme being and creator of all this wonderful splendor!

choice.text: Supreme Being? Pader Doglas may have some issues with that.
I feel much more enlightened now!

dialog.text: It's so wonderful to meet someone who gives thanks to Bathala!
So, how can we improve each other's karma today?

choice.text: I need some good vibes to help me win the election.
I'd like your support in the elections.

dialog.text: The good Pader and I have very different spiritual views.
I'm so happy to help you on the path to Enlightenment!
Your honesty speaks to a good hear but our spirits need to be more intertwined before I can lend you my support.
You know, I try to be open and accepting to all, but you're really just being mean. I have to cleanse this negativity now. Goodbye.
Oh dear, it's time for my daily spiritual cleansing! Let's speak again soon. Bathala bless you!
Ni hao!
Knock Knock...
Ako maba
This meeting never took place.
We never met
Let me tell you about my favorite 18th century visionary...
... blah * blah * ...
*play poker or something*
Grab some grub and fish with me.
That's some good fishin
Mouse, I ain't got no time for no chit chat
But a few bottles wouldn't hurt
*gulp gulp*
Bless you, my child.
* salvation and spirits *
Peace and love!
* surfing tips *
Looking for something?
* economics (the freaky kind) *
Why did the chicken cross the road?
Hahahaha *share jokes *
We don't have much to talk about.
* whispers carelessly*
